page.title: 19HAWLEY VILLAGE - LIFESTYLE
page.content: Hawley is a small village outside Dartford in the Darent Valley. A variety of private houses makes up the village, one section in an estate the others strung out along the A.225. Shops are few and far between and tend to be General Stores including one Post Office. One unusual shop is the "Saddlery" . The River Darent provides the beauty spot of the area. The banks are mostly overgrown with a variety of plants. The river is stocked with all kinds of fish Kingfishers can be seen along with other birds. The river flows through a farm, where geese,ducks,guinea fowl, hens and cattle roam freely about the farmland-a picturesque view. Across the area cut two major roads,the A2 and M25 A Garden Centre has been developed recently from a nursery. Its progress and development has been considerabl
